name: Rhythmic boxes
description:
Controls:
Click to a box and use WASD to move it.
Space to restart the arrow and the signal.

You have to get the blue arrow to the yellow diamond. Use boxes to change direction and speed up, but stay away from lava! Everything changes to the rhythm, so timing is key. There are 5 puzzles. Can you beat them all?

This game was created for MiniJam 125: Signal with limitation Everything is tied to the rhythym.

Art was made by myself.
SFX:
https://freesound.org/
